Snippet.Name: FunctionMultiStatementTableValuedCreateAndDropIfExist
Snippet.Description: Create multi-statement function (new menu), and drop previous one with the same name
Snippet.Text:
-- ================================================ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO -- ============================================= -- Author: /*Author*/ -- Create date: /*Create Date*/ -- Description: /*Description*/ -- ============================================= CREATE FUNCTION /*Table_Function_Name*/ ( -- Add the parameters for the function here /*@param1*/ /*data_type_for_param1*/, /*@param2*/ /*data_type_for_param2*/ ) RETURNS /*@Table_Variable_Name*/ TABLE ( -- Add the column definitions for the TABLE variable here /*Column_1*/ /*Data_Type_For_Column1*/, /*Column_2*/ /*Data_Type_For_Column2*/ ) AS BEGIN -- Fill the table variable with the rows for your result set
RETURN END GO
